    • Method Detail

      • releaseWaiters

        public void releaseWaiters()
        Used internally. Do not call directly. Use requestMutex and releaseMutex instead.

        Release 1 (and only 1) waiter currently registered for the item.

        Called by releaseMutex

        Overrides:
        releaseWaiters in class SEMState
        See Also:
        MutexState#releaseMutex()

      • isAvailable

        public boolean isAvailable()
        Returns:
        true if the Mutex is currently not held by any owner.

      • requestMutex

        public com.ibm.staf.STAFResult requestMutex(java.lang.String holder)
                                     throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Request exclusive ownership of the Mutex.
        Calling thread will be blocked until access is granted.
        Parameters:
        holder -
        Returns:
        STAFResult.Ok, STAFResult.InvalidParam.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if the waiting thread is interrupted.

      • releaseMutex

        public com.ibm.staf.STAFResult releaseMutex(java.lang.String holder)
        Release 1 (and only 1) Mutex waiter currently registered for the item.

        Only the owner of the Mutex can release it.

        Returns:
        STAFResult.OK, STAFResult.NotSemaphoreOwner.
